scripts.prepare: npx shx mkdir -p ./src/worker/imported && npx shx cp -f ./node_modules/wwobjloader2/src/worker/OBJLoader2Worker.js ./src/worker/imported
scripts.build:worker: npx shx rm -f ./dist/helloWorldWorkerStandard.js && vite -c vite.config.worker.ts build
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:worker && npm run compile
